p: 500 ml formaldehyde solution (lot: 111008) was provided by Chengdu Jinshan Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd. (Chengdu, China). 56° Liquor (lot: 20110923) was purchased from Beijing Hongxing Co., Ltd. (Beijing, China). All the Chinese herbs in this recipe were produced by Sichuan Lotus Decoction pieces Co., Ltd. (Sichuan, China). The herbs were identified as genuine medicinal materials by Professor Zhu-yun Yan from the Department of Authenticity Appraisal of Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, according to the Pharmacopoeia of the People's Republic of China (2010).
